title: Mediterraneo: The Law of the Sea

sources.title: Law of the Sea
sources.description: Two sea captains - one good and one evil - battle each other and their women pay the price in this complicated human drama.

metadata.Plot: The incredible story about a few good men who risked their own life to save many others. The movie is set on the humanitarian crisis unfolding in the Mediterranean sea.
metadata.Writer: Marcel Barrena, Òscar Camps, Danielle Schleif
metadata.Actors: Eduard Fernández, Dani Rovira, Anna Castillo
